duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform routine tasks associated with the general laboratory animal care in biomedical research.
Operate automatic washing and cleaning equipment and autoclaves.
Receive, disinfect, and store various supplies and equipment into the facility.
Maintain simple records of activities and animal behavior.
Feed and house laboratory animals, as well as maintain general laboratory animal housekeeping.
Collect hair, fecal, and blood samples for diagnostic testing.
Clean tasks associated with the upkeep of a research animal facility.
Order and stock supplies, and utilize computer skills for email, training, and basic data entry.
Work schedule includes weekend and holiday hours.

education_certification.credential: Must have at least an 8th-grade education, with 2 years of laboratory animal care experience.
